attributes.action: Stop car insurance companies extorting young drivers !
attributes.background: Young drivers are being charged in excess of £1500 for 12 months of insurance often with restrictions on how many miles they can do or curfews in place. This is ridiculous and in my opinion and many others it is extortion! I am 21 with a 1.0 car and pay over £1200 per year for a 5000 mile policy.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to take a specific action to reduce the cost of car insurance for young people. 

For example, the Petitions Committee (the group of MPs who oversee the petitions system) is currently looking into this petition,  which will be scheduled for a debate in Parliament soon: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/166847
